thread.title: Local boy who spurned KGW's Drew Carney for Lester Holt meets the NBC News anchor (video)
thread.title_full: Local boy who spurned KGW's Drew Carney for Lester Holt meets the NBC News anchor (video)

author: Kristi Turnquist | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Local boy who spurned KGW's Drew Carney for Lester Holt meets the NBC News anchor (video)
text: A local 7-year-old named Jaden had a viral video moment when he told KGW's Drew Carney that he wasn't on TV news as much as Lester Holt, anchor of "NBC Nightly News." On Tuesday, Jaden and his family got to meet Holt himself, on a visit to the newsman's NBC News offices and "Nightly News" studio.
